text: The North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball team is an American college basketball team. The team plays for the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. The team plays in Division I of the NCAA. The team plays in the Atlantic Coast Conference (ACC). As of 2023, the Tar Heels have won six NCAA championships. They won in 1957, 1982, 1993, 2005, 2009, and 2017. They have been to the Final Four more than any other college basketball team. They have been to the Final Four twenty one times. == References == Category:Basketball teams in the United States
title: North Carolina Tar Heels men's basketball
